          <title>
            <string language="fr">Mélanges de couleurs primaires</string>
            <string language="en">Mixtures of primary colours</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mischungen von Primärfarben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Misturas de cores preliminares</string>

          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre les couleurs produites à partir du mélange des couleurs primaires rouge, vert et bleu.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the colours produced from the mixture of the primary colours  red, green and blue.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="fr">Bleu</string>
            <string language="en">Blue</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Farben, die aus der 
Mischung der Primärfarben Rot, Grün und Blau produziert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as cores produzidas da 
mistura das cores preliminares vermelho, verde e azul.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i colori prodotti 
dalla miscela dei colori primari colore rosso, verde ed azzurro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τα χρώματα που παράγονται
από το μίγμα του αρχικού κοκκίνου χρωμάτων, πράσινος και μπλε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los colores producidos 
de la mezcla de los colores primarios rojo, verde y azul.</string>
